g.text: two-way tls
currently client have public ca cert
use public ca cert verify public server cert
if unvalid, will display https warning
use public server cert to encrypt random key
use private client key sign previous handshake messages
use the private server key to create a certificate signing request (CSR)
currently server have private key and public cert
(async)every body can get public ca cert
1: request https://server-domain.com
2: response public server cert
3: required a cert
4: response a public client cert
5: generated random symmetric key
6: transfer encrypted symmetric key
7: sends a signed handshake message
11: use symmetric key to encryt content
12: use symmetric key to descrypt content
1: generated private server key
2: certificate signing request
3: return signed public server cert
(async)every body can get public ca cert
4: use public ca cert verify server cert
currently server have client ca
8: use client ca cert verify public client cert
9: use private server key to decrypt encrypted key
10: use public client cert to verify signed messages
currently server have symmetric key
ca holds private ca key and public ca cert
use private ca key signing cert
certificate signing
strict
